job_purpose: Deliver technical expertise in operational support for a major customer within the pharmaceutical industry, ensuring efficient automation processes and compliance with industry standards.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Provide daily operational support for complex manufacturing facilities
Diagnose and troubleshoot hardware and software issues
Implement Process Automation, including SCADA and MES solutions
Oversee JAG automation systems ensuring compliant execution of all lifecycle activities
Review and approve system lifecycle documentation for JAG hardware and software
Participate in expansion projects by identifying, designing, documenting, and implementing changes to the Software portfolio
Conduct plant user training when required
Support Operations with occasional out-of-hours technical support
Promote a safety culture and ensure HSE responsibilities are fulfilled
Maintain and promote a cGMP compliant culture within the area of responsibility
required_qualifications: Degree in Engineering/Automation preferred, Computer Science degree accepted
Experience in the Automation industry, preferably in the pharmaceutical or highly regulated industry
Knowledge in the development and testing of Automated systems
Troubleshooting automated systems and resolving technical issues independently
Knowledge of SCADA/PLC development, preferred PCS integration with IT networks and infrastructure
Strong communication skills with customers, design teams, contractors, and management
Action-oriented with good problem-solving, technical learning, time management, and prioritizing skills
Ability to thrive in a team environment
company_details: JAG Automation is a leading automation company in the field, offering extensive in-house training, unique project opportunities, career progression, and a culture focused on innovation, collaboration, and individual contribution.
